data.persona: I am a cat of the castle. I have slain many birds. I spy on the king.
data.description:
You are in the farmhouse.
a small house on a seaweed plantation, small and rustic, really only the single room with a closet, maybe, a table and some chairs
There's a pitchfork, a chair, a shovel, and a table here.
A horse is here.

You are carrying a dog, and wielding a blacksmith's hammer.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the horse so that I will get the blacksmith's attention
data.mid_motivation: I want to get his attention so that he will put the dog down
data.long_motivation: I want him to put the dog down so that he will pick me up

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the blacksmith, I want to know what he's doing

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the blacksmith, maybe he will pick me up

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go the castle, and return to the King
